commits.subject: fix: add root index.html to resolve GitHub Pages 404 error
commits.body:
The monorepo structure moved the vanilla JS app to legacy/ but GitHub
Pages requires index.html at the root. This redirect ensures the site
loads correctly while the SvelteKit build/deploy workflow is set up.

commits.subject: Merge pull request #95 from devmade-ai/claude/continue-work-TaIOJ
commits.body: feat: add sensitivity analysis and growth projections UI

commits.subject: feat: complete input field configs for all transaction models
commits.body:
Added all missing input fields to inputFields.ts:
- Model 2: licence terms, territory, source code access, useful lives
- Model 3: project duration, personnel FTEs/costs, IP contributions
- Model 4: operating costs, revenue estimates, transfer timing
- Model 5: payment terms, maintenance costs
- Model 6: support costs

Also added researchPhaseCost and developmentPhaseCost to common fields.

commits.subject: feat: add structure selector wizard for model recommendation
commits.body:
- Create wizard configuration with 6 decision factors and scoring logic
- Build StructureWizard component with progressive disclosure UI
- Add live preview of recommendations as user answers questions
- Include variant preference selector within selected model
- Add view mode toggle on structuring page (Wizard | Browse All)
- Update documentation

commits.subject: feat: add sensitivity analysis and growth projections UI
commits.body:
- Add ApexCharts integration for data visualization
- Create chart component library (BaseChart, TornadoChart, ScenarioChart,
  CashFlowChart, CumulativeCashFlowChart, NPVComparisonChart)
- Create analysis panels (SensitivityPanel, ProjectionsPanel,
  ProjectionMetrics)
- Add tabbed interface to calculator page (Results | Sensitivity |
  Projections)
- Update formatters with compact currency notation for charts
- Update documentation

commits.subject: docs: update session notes and history for architecture redesign
commits.body:
- Update SESSION_NOTES.md with Phase 4 completion details
- Add architecture redesign section to HISTORY.md
- Add remaining work items to TODO.md (sensitivity UI, projections UI, charts)

Documentation now captures full context for continuing in future sessions.

commits.subject: feat: add model comparison view with save/compare functionality
commits.body:
- Add comparison store with localStorage persistence (lib/stores)
- Create ComparisonManager component for saving and selecting options
- Create ComparisonView for side-by-side comparison (2-4 options)
- Integrate save modal and comparison into calculator page

Users can now:
- Save calculation results with custom names
- Select 2-4 saved options and compare side-by-side
- See difference indicators (best/worst values highlighted)
- Export/import saved options as JSON
- View all key metrics across Developer, Buyer, and TP Risk sections

commits.subject: docs: add user actions preference and USER_ACTIONS.md
commits.body:
Add preference #11 to document manual user actions (external
dashboards, credentials, etc.) in docs/USER_ACTIONS.md.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: feat: add data-driven input field configurations for all 6 models
commits.body:
- Create lib/config/inputFields.ts with field configs for Models 1-6
- Each model has specific fields: project name, costs, revenues, tax settings
- Calculator page now renders inputs dynamically from configuration
- Reduces input section from ~170 lines to ~15 lines of code

This makes adding new input fields trivial - just update the config.
